text: The Himalayan wolf is a proposed clade within the Tibetan wolf (Canis lupus filchneri) subspecies. Its mitochondrial DNA is basal to all other wolves including other Tibetan wolves. The taxonomic status of this wolf clade was disputed: the separate species Canis himalayensis was proposed, based on two limited DNA studies. ==References== Category:Wolves Category:Mammals of Pakistan Category:Plants and animals of Kashmir
title: Himalayan wolf
